title: Copies - Outside the UK
question: How many extra certified copies of the grant do you need for use outside the UK?
paragraph1: Order extra certified copies of the grant if you need to claim the estate outside the UK.
paragraph2: A certified copy will have the same features as the official copy and extra information confirming the details of the certification on the back of it.
